column4: Is there a way I can syn a folder on my laptop and on a USB stick? I keep a "docs" folder on each and I tend to edit them separately, but want to sync them. How do I do this?
depends on the format of the docs
if the docs are just text files learn to use subversion

haha no it's not strictly docs. I'm a grad student, it's all my research data, figures, papers... etc. I just sometimes hop on another computer and edit a file. I want to make sure the most recent file is updated
you could try something like subversion...
Well yes, but I want a backup
